## Matrix4x4.frustum() method

Creates a perspective projection matrix from a frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static frustum(left: number, right: number, bottom: number, top: number, znear: number, zfar: number, result?: Matrix4x4): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | number | Left bound of the frustum. |
|  right | number | Right bound of the frustum. |
|  bottom | number | Bottom bound of the frustum. |
|  top | number | Top bound of the frustum. |
|  znear | number | Near bound of the frustum. |
|  zfar | number | Far bound of the frustum. |
|  result | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output matrix, if not specified, a new matrix will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

The output matrix
